import "./contact.css"; import Navbar from "../../components/navbar/navbar"; import emailjs from "emailjs-com"; import axios from "axios"; import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; const Mailer = () => { function sendEmail(e) { e.preventDefault(); emailjs .sendForm( "service_5l7kh0n", "template_gx7wc6r", e.target, "user_MwbDvlvwreTZP8lUuL6jE" ) .then((res) => { console.log(res); }) .catch((err) => console.log(err)); } const [contact, setContact] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios .get("http://localhost:5003/contact/") .then((response) => { this.setState({ Contact: response.data }); }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error); }); }, []); // export default class Contacts extends Component{ // render(){ return (
{contact.map((item, index) => (
